summary: A simple mod that adds a perk to the skill tree that makes using One-Handed weapons with nothing in the offhand more useful.
descriptionHtml:
Adds the Combat Focus perk to the One-Handed skill tree, which makes One-Handed combat with nothing in the offhand more viable.

Combat Focus:
-Applies when there is only a One-Handed weapon equipped. Nothing can be equipped in the off hand, including shields or magic.
-Is unlocked at One-Handed 45.
-Adds +20% Damage
-Adds +10% Block
-Is suitable for Swordsmen, Samurai, Savages, and other specific roleplay needs.

CHANGE LOG
1.1
Combat Focus now works with a torch equipped!

1.1.5
Fixed conditions for taking the perk. Fully functional now!
author: Raidey

files.name: PURE One-Handed COmbat - Combat Focus Perk
files.fileName: PURE One-Handed COmbat - Combat Focus Perk-15394-1-1-5.zip
files.changelogHtml: Fixed conditions for unlocking the perk. This mod is now fully functional!
